legal_basis: PRRA officers must assess only new evidence that arose after rejection or was not reasonably available
reasonableness_standard: Standard of review is reasonableness simpliciter
documentary_evidence: Letter from Malaysian police confirmed applicant's cooperation in a 1985 murder case
evidence_assessment: Applicant failed to explain why the letter wasn't submitted earlier
risk_of_persecution: Applicant claimed risk of persecution due to witnessing a murder and aiding police
credibility_findings: rejected by RPD due to credibility issues
review_standard: Judicial review application under IRPA subsection 72(1); PRRA decision reviewed for reasonableness
